column2: This character is trained in deadly explosion magic.
As a Crimson Mage you can learn explosion magic.
A strange traveler wearing exotic red clothing has come to your court claiming to me a "mage." Their claims are highly unorthodox.
Intriguing, I will tolerate them for now.
I shall have them teach me their ways.
This person is a heretic and shall be burned.
I have successfully learned the ways of a proper Crimson Mage
